skins.selfIntroduction: As a lead ship, I may not be as qualified as my sisters due to my armament... As a result, I've come to value problem-solving in other ways rather than directly fighting.
skins.acquisition: Pleased to meet you, Commander! I'm the one in the exact middle of the 1936A-class destroyers, Z28! My mission is to support you to the best of my abilities!
skins.login: Ah... Commander, I'm sure you had your reasons for being late! Anyway, it's fine, don't worry about it! Let's just word hard starting right now!
skins.details: Commander, look at this torpedo! I drew a funny face on it! Cute, isn't it?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I want to play with cute animals all day long~/This big ol' office feels a bit empty, but it's also refreshing and helps me focus on work!/If you finish all your work on time, I'll make some delicious sweets for you~
skins.secretaryTouch: Please go to sleep already! You can wait until later to finish the work!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: All the girls will hate you if you do stuff like this, you know?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Ehehe, let me pat your head too~

skins.shipDescription: Commander, Happy New Year! Is there anything you'd like to do on New Year's Day? Say, why don't we try doing all of that stuff, all at once~?
skins.acquisition: Commander, Happy New Year! Is there anything you'd like to do on New Year's Day? Say, why don't we try doing all of that stuff, all at once~?
skins.login: Hello, Commander. I thought you were still hiding inside the kotatsu. Ehehe~
skins.details: Should I make offerings at the shrine first, or play hanetsuki with my friends...? Ugh, there are just so many things I want to do!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, look at this lifelike tail! Doesn't this make me look like one of those girls from the Sakura Empire?/Hmm, why does this lion have a scary face? ...Wouldn't it be better if he's cute...?/Commander, want to try some New Year dango? ...Here, open your mouth, say ahhn~
skins.secretaryTouch: All tuckered out from playing? Let's take a break then! I'll wake you up if there's an exciting event going on!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Promise me you won't do this any more, okay?
